2012 Football Roster

Choose a Player:

13 Darius Jones

Position Cornerback

Height 5-10

Weight 175

Class Senior

Hometown Rockwall, TX

High School Rockwall-Heath

Bio

Stats

Historical

Biography

Montana State (2012) Finished his career as one of the top cornerbacks in Bobcat history… Second Team All-Big Sky for the second straight season… second in the Big Sky in passes defended as a senior (nine)… team-high four interceptions… one of five Bobcat defensive players tabbed for Preseason All-Big Sky honors… also mentioned on several Preseason All-America lists. (2011) Snagged first career interception in playoff win over New Hampshire… Second Team All-Big Sky… season high eight tackles against Weber State… shared team lead with eight pass breakups… 61 tackles was tied for fourth on the team. (2010) Started all 12 games for the Bobcats… his 10 pass breakups led the team… recorded five tackles, one for a loss, with a forced fumble and two pass breakups against Washington State… six tackles with three pass breakups and a blocked kick against NAU. (2009) Played in 10 games, starting three, before missing the season finale with an injury… registered 22 tackles, four for a loss, including a season high four against Portland State… his four pass breakups was second on the team… in MSU’s last six games, recorded three pass breakups, 3.5 TL, and a fumble return for a touchdown.

High School A two-time all-conference choice at Rockwall-Heath High… intercepted three passes each his junior and senior seasons, earning all-conference honors after each campaign.

Academics Majoring in Health Enhancement.

Personal Born October 31, 1990 in Greenville, Tex… one of three children of Monique Williams… former prep teammate of Bobcat receiver Everett Gilbert, as well as Missouri’s Kendial Lawrence and Ryan Mosby of Kentucky.
